COMMANDS.8BALL_PROFANE: \‚ùå **%AUTHOR%**, I can't reply to question with something profane on it..
COMMANDS.EQUIP_IDINVALID: \‚ùå **%AUTHOR%**, The supplied ID is invalid or there is no supplied ID!
COMMANDS.EQUIP_NOITEM: \‚ùå **%AUTHOR%**, You don't have this item in your inventory!
COMMANDS.EQUIP_XITEM: \‚ùå **%AUTHOR%**, This item can no longer be equipped!
COMMANDS.EQUIP_UNEQUIPBL: \‚ùå **%AUTHOR%**, This item type cannot be equipped!
COMMANDS.RESPOND_CNOTSET:
\‚ùå **%AUTHOR%**, the **Suggestion Channel** for this server has not been set! If you're a server administrator, you may set the channel by typing:
`%PREFIX%setsuggestch <channel ID | channel mention>`
COMMANDS.RESPOND_CINVALD: \‚ùå **%AUTHOR%**, the **Suggestion Channel** for this server is not anymore valid! Please have the server administrator set a new one!
COMMANDS.RESPOND_IDINVLD:
\‚ùå **%AUTHOR%**, the **message ID** of the suggestion could not be found on this server's suggest channel or you didn't provide one. Proper usage of this command would be:
`%PREFIX%respond <message ID> <action type> <...reason>`
COMMANDS.RESPOND_NOTSUGG: \‚ùå **%AUTHOR%**, `%MESSAGEID%'s` message is not a valid suggestion message. Please select messages only from the suggest channel set for this server.
COMMANDS.RESPOND_ACINVLD:
\‚ùå **%AUTHOR%**, the **action type** for this suggestion must only be one of the following: `accept` or `deny`. Proper usage of this command would be:
`%PREFIX%respond <message ID> <action type> <...reason>`
COMMANDS.RESPOND_XREASON:
\‚ùå **%AUTHOR%**, the reason you provided exceeds the maximum allowable length of 1024 characters or you didn't provide any reason. Proper usage of this command would be:
`%PREFIX%respond <message ID> <action type> <...reason>`
COMMANDS.RESPOND_ALRESPN: \‚ùå **%AUTHOR%**, this suggestion has already been responded with. You cannot respond to it anymore.
COMMANDS.RESPOND_NOEDIT: \‚ùå **%AUTHOR%**, I could not access the message! The suggest message is uneditable and may have been corrupted.
COMMANDS.RESPOND_SENDUSR: Hey **%USER%**, your suggestion has been **%STATUS%** by **%AUTHOR%** on **%GUILDNAME%**. Click the following link to jump to that message -> %LINK%
COMMANDS.RESPOND_ERROR: \‚ùå **%AUTHOR%**, A problem has occured while processing this suggestion: `%ERROR%`
COMMANDS.TIP_ALREADYGIVN: \‚ùå **%AUTHOR%**, you already used your tip. You can wait for `%DURATION%` to tip someone again.
COMMANDS.TIP_NOMEMBER: \‚úîÔ∏è **%AUTHOR%**, you can now tip someone from this server!
COMMANDS.TIP_INVALIDMEM: \‚ùå **%AUTHOR%**, the user you provided could not be found in this server!
COMMANDS.TIP_TIPPEDISSLF: \‚ùå **%AUTHOR%**, you cannot give a tip to yourself!
COMMANDS.TRANSFER_NOMEM: \‚ùå **%AUTHOR%**, please include the member you want your coins to transfer to.
COMMANDS.TRANSFER_INMEM: \‚ùå **%AUTHOR%**, I couldn't find that member in this server!
COMMANDS.TRANSFER_BTMEM: \‚ùå **%AUTHOR%**, you cannot transfer coins to a bot!
COMMANDS.TRANSFER_TSELF: \‚ùå **%AUTHOR%**, you cannot transfer coins to yourself
COMMANDS.TRANSFER_YOUNG: \‚ùå **%AUTHOR%**, you cannot transfer coins to an account which is less than 2 weeks old.
COMMANDS.TRANSFER_NOAMT: \‚ùå **%AUTHOR%**, please specify the amount you like to transfer.
COMMANDS.TRANSFER_INAMT: \‚ùå **%AUTHOR%**, **%AMOUNT%** is an invalid amount. Make sure the amount are all digit (remove all symbols, including commas, periods, and monetary signs)
COMMANDS.TRANSFER_INSUF: \‚ùå **%AUTHOR%**, Insuffecient credits! You only have **%BANK%** in your bank! (10% fee applies)
COMMANDS.UNEQUIP_NOTYPE: \‚ùå **%AUTHOR%**, Please select one of the following: %TYPES%
